genericContent.itemName: RCA 40" LCD 1080p, 40LA45RQ, RCA Home Theater System wtih 6ft HDMI Cable, TV Bundle
genericContent.shortDescription:
With 1080p full-HD resolution, a high brightness level and a high contrast ratio, the RCA 40" 1080p HDTV delivers true high-definition picture quality. Multiple types of connection options give you flexibility and the high-gloss piano black finish improves its looks.

Note: You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the RCA LCD HDTV. Contact your local cable or satellite TV service provider for details on how to upgrade.
genericContent.longDescription:
RCA 40" Class 1080p Widescreen LCD HDTV:

  • 16:9 LCD panel
    With 1920 x 1080 Full-HD resolution
  • 40" class screen size
    40" screen of this RCA LCD HDTV measured diagonally from corner to corner
  • VESA wall mount compatible
    See a clear picture on any wall in the room
  • Built-in digital tuner
    Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available
  • High brightness of 500cd/m2 with 6.5-ms. response time
    Place your 40" 1080p HDTV anywhere
  • 3,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio
  • HDMI Inputs: 2
    Enjoy a superior HD experience with the HDMI one-cable solution
  • VGA port
    Use your RCA LCD HDTV as a computer monitor, enjoying connectivity to the Internet
genericContent.shelfDescription: <li>40" diagonal screen size<li>2 HDMI inputs<li>VESA wall mount compatible<li>VGA port for computer connectivity
